content: oregon tweed socks by melissa a barton this is a perfect second pair pattern once you ve gotten the hang of socks add some texture through this pattern yarn light fingering yarn 380 yards gauge 7 =1 in tweed pattern needles 4 double pointed needles size 2 25mm or needles to get correct gauge copyright 2009 melissa a barton pattern cuff cast on 68 stitches making sure to use an elastic cast-on method like a knitted cast-on divide onto 3 needles being careful not to twist sts 22 stitches on first two needles 24 stitches on 3rd needle to connect into a round take the first stitch and the last stitch in the round and overlap them by put- ting the first stitch on the last needle and the last stitch on the first needle place a marker on the last knotted stitch to show the start of each row knit a 1x1 rib for 2 inches tweed pattern for body of sock round 1-3 purl to end round 4-6 k1 p1 to end repeat row 1-6 to desired length ending on row 6 of pattern divide for heel flap arrange 34 sts on needle 1 and 17 sts on needles 2 and 3 68 sts row 1 starting with the first stitch after the marker sl1 k33 turn do not continue onto other nee- dles row 2 sl1 p1 to end turn repeat row 1 and 2 17 more times for a total of 34 row 17 slipped sts on each side turning the heel row 1 rs row k19 k2tog k1 turn row 2 p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 knit to within 1 st before gap k2tog k1 turn row 4 slip 1 p1 to within 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn copyright 2009 melissa a barton repeat row 3 & 4 until all sts are k ending with a p row there will be 18 sts remaining gusset with loose needles pu and k18 sts along side of heel using the slipped sts on the edge combine the stitches from needles 2 & 3 instep onto one needle knit across these stitches in the 1x1 rib stitch pick up and k 18 sts up the other side of the heel with a spare needle as you did the first side arrange the stitches so that needle 1 has 9 stitches from the heel and 18 stitches from the side needle 2 has 34 instep stitches in rib stitch and needle 3 has 18 stitches from the side and 9 stitches from the heel 88 sts total round 1 needle 1 knit needle 2 k1 p1 rib for instep needle 3 knit round 2 needle 1 knit to 3 stitches before end of needle k2tog k1 needle 2 knit across instep in pattern on needle 2 needle 3 k1 ssk k to end repeat row 1 & 2 until there are the original 68 sts there will be 17 stitches on needles 1 & 3 body
